refnamediv.refpurpose: get result of peer certificate verification

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_get_verify_result() returns the result of the verification of the X509 certificate presented by the peer, if any.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: SSL_get_verify_result() can only return one error code while the verification of a certificate can fail because of many reasons at the same time. Only the last verification error that occurred during the processing is available from SSL_get_verify_result().
The verification result is part of the established session and is restored when a session is reused.

refsection.title: BUGS
refsection.para: If no peer certificate was presented, the returned result code is X509_V_OK. This is because no verification error occurred, it does however not indicate success. SSL_get_verify_result() is only useful in connection with SSL_get_peer_certificate 3 .

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: The following return values can currently occur:

listitem.para: The verification succeeded or no peer certificate was presented.
